revision.text: ==Navajo== ===Etymology=== {{nv-prefixes|3o|3s|∅}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-ghaas}} {{nv-link-to-root|-GHAZ|scratch}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb|transitive}} # (with {{m|nv|tsiih}}) he/she is [[scratch#Verb|scratching]] it, [[rip#Verb|ripping]] it, giving it a [[scratch#Noun|scratch]] into its flesh ====Conjugation==== {{nv-paradigm|momentaneous|∅/yi}}. {{nv-verbtable|IMPERFECTIVE |yisxaas|yiigaas|deiigaas|nighaas|wohhaas|daahhaas|yighaas|deighaas|jighaas|dajighaas}} {{nv-verbtable|PERFECTIVE |yíghaz|yiigaz|deiigaz|yíníghaz|wooghaz|daooghaz|yiyííghaz|dayííghaz|jííghaz|dajííghaz}} ====Verbal stems==== * IMPERFECTIVE: -ghaas * PERFECTIVE: -ghaz * FUTURE: -ghas * ITERATIVE: -gas * OPTATIVE: -ghaas
